title: Predicting five NFL teams that will improve this season: How the Raiders and Giants got better
content: Which teams will bounce back and win more games this season? We made five picks based on offseason additions, fumble luck and more.

title: Omaha forward Mayar dies in drowning incident
content: Omaha Mavericks forward Deng Mayar, who transferred from North Dakota this offseason, died Saturday in a drowning incident.

title: Sources: DFA'd by Nats, Lowe set to join Red Sox
content: Veteran first baseman Nathaniel Lowe, 30, designated for assignment by the Washington Nationals earlier this month, and the Boston Red Sox are finalizing a deal, sources told ESPN, paving the way for him to join one of the strongest lineups in baseball.

title: Bills called out by McDermott after blowout loss
content: Bills coach Sean McDermott said his team's blowout preseason loss to the Bears was "certainly not up to our standard."

title: Vols name Aguilar starting QB after Iamaleava exit
content: Joey Aguilar was named Tennessee's starting quarterback Sunday, beating out redshirt freshman Jake Merklinger for the job.

title: Robles ejected for hurling bat at Triple-A pitcher
content: During his rehabilitation assignment with Triple-A Tacoma on Sunday, Mariners veteran outfielder Victor Robles was ejected from a game in Las Vegas, after he was nearly hit by an inside pitch and tossed his bat at starting pitcher Joey Estes.

title: Howell, 18, wins U.S. Amateur; youngest since '09
content: Mason Howell, 18, capped a productive summer before his senior year of high school by winning the U.S. Amateur at The Olympic Club on Sunday. He's the third-youngest U.S. Amateur champion ever.

title: Scheffler wins BMW, fifth PGA Tour crown of '25
content: Scottie Scheffler erased a four-shot deficit in five holes then delivered a haymaker on the daunting par-3 17th by chipping in from 82 feet for birdie that carried him to victory Sunday in the BMW Championship for his fifth PGA Tour title of the year.

title: Johnson praises Williams: Bears QB 'locked in'
content: Bears quarterback Caleb Williams put together a sharp preseason debut Sunday night that capped his best stretch of training camp and earned praise from coach Ben Johnson.

title: üèà Fantasy Football 2025: Ultimate Draft Board
content: Mike Clay provides his blueprint for 2025 fantasy football drafts, including ideal selections in each round and overall strategy.

content: Vick is coaching just 30 miles from where he grew up, and in the state where he electrified college football as a player.

content: These players are truly for those in deeper leagues seeking off-the-radar types who may emerge in 2025.

content: After visits with 10 NFL teams in eight states, Ben Solak compiled the best things he heard -- and saw -- throughout the trip.

content: The biggest games, wildest races, must-see players and small-school mayhem. Bill Connelly is here for it all.

title: 'We know how to weather storms': How the Aces saved their WNBA season
content: Las Vegas, .500 at the All-Star break, has won seven straight and is vying to host early WNBA playoff games.

title: Carlos Alcaraz, Emma Raducanu and a world of shipping
content: Carlos Alcaraz and Emma Raducanu say they're just friends. But a growing group of their fans is rooting for far more than just a US Open mixed doubles title. Welcome to the world of tennis shippers.

title: Barcelona's hot start, Bayern win Supercup, more from the weekend
content: We're back for the 2025-26 and Gab Marcotti has a lot to unpack from opening weekend! From Arsenal's win over Man United to Barcelona's hot start, let's recap the weekend.

title: The VAR Review: Explaining Eze's disallowed goal, and why Senesi escaped a red card
content: Looking at Eberechi Eze's disallowed free kick for Crystal Palace at Chelsea, and Marcos Senesi's possible red card against Liverpool.

title: The stat that could swing every NBA team's 2025-26 season
content: What numbers are teams focused on with just over a month until camp? Zach Kram runs down the big stat for all 30 franchises.

title: Venus Williams is back at the US Open -- eyeing one title not on her long list
content: Two-time former US Open champion Venus Williams will play again this week. And she still has one major career goal.

title: Akie Iwai wins Portland Classic for first LPGA Tour title
content: Akie Iwai joined twin sister Chisato as a rookie LPGA Tour winner Sunday at Columbia Edgewater, closing with a 6-under 66 for a four-stroke victory in The Standard Portland Classic.

title: Arsenal begin new season in style as problems persist for Man United
content: Arsenal open their Premier League campaign with a crucial 1-0 win at Manchester United, exposing the key differences between the two sides.

title: Inside the hidden costs of football: '88 Saints speak out
content: Nearly 40 years after their time in the NFL, the players from the 1988 New Orleans Saints grapple with the physical toll of football while honoring a bond forged through the toughest game.

title: Texans and Eagles trading previously dealt picks back to each other? Who won the Bryant-Metchie trade?
content: Who won the recent Texans-Eagles trade? What about the Jalen Ramsey-Minkah Fitzpatrick swap? We sized up the offseason's trades.

title: How clubs are using loyalty against unhappy or unwanted stars
content: Loyalty is a virtue, but in football business comes first. Isak is now walking the rocky path previously taken by stars like Alexander-Arnold and Kane.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool, Man United, Spurs eye Brentford defender Collins
content: Brentford defender Nathan Collins has emerged as a target for Liverpool, Man United and Spurs. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: üéµ Taylor Swift joins Kelce brothers on 'New Heights'
content: The superstar debuted on Jason and Travis Kelce's "New Heights" podcast, talked about becoming a football fan -- and even caught Caitlin Clark's attention.

title: üìà NFL Future Power Rankings
content: We ranked all 32 NFL franchises' expectations for 2025 through 2027. Which teams are set up to thrive in the future?

title: üèà Predicting best, worst scenarios for NFL teams
content: We simulated best-case and worst-case scenarios for every team, and our NFL reporters picked the biggest variables.

title: üèÄ Is there any coming back for banned Knicks fans?
content: Despite backlash, MSG Entertainment's "attorney exclusion list" is still in effect, reportedly banning over a thousand lawyers since 2022.

title: Jon Rahm defends LIV points title but loses in playoff
content: Jon Rahm successfully defended his LIV Golf season points title but still lost in a playoff to Sebastian Munoz in the Indianapolis event.

title: "Weapons Today Are Algorithms, Not Guns": Gautam Adani At IIT Kharagpur
content: The wars nowadays are often invisible and technology-driven, industrialist Gautam Adani said at IIT Kharagpur on Monday evening, asserting that algorithms are today's weapons and not guns.

title: Rain Havoc In Mumbai: A Look At 10 Most Striking Visuals
content: Mumbai continued to receive heavy rains for the third consecutive day on Monday, leading to waterlogging and heavy traffic jams in many parts of the city.

title: "Illegal Immigrant": Team Trump After Indian-Origin Man's Wrong U-Turn Kills 3 In US
content: Three people were killed on Florida's Turnpike on Saturday after a semi-truck made an illegal U-turn, causing a collision. The tragic incident also set off a tornado of racist taunts thrown at the Indian-origin driver.

title: Vijay Rallies Cadre Ahead Of Madurai Meet, Predicts TVK Win In 2026 Polls
content: TVK Chief and actor Vijay issued a rallying call to cadre ahead of the party's state conference in Madurai on August 21, declaring that the 2026 Assembly polls will mark a turning point in Tamil Nadu's political history.

title: 'Salary Or Legacy?' Gautam Adani To Graduating Students At IIT Kharagpur
content: Gautam Adani, Chairman of the Adani Group, turned philosopher, historian, and futurist at IIT Kharagpur on Monday as he urged India's brightest engineering students to choose a life of "legacy over salary".

title: Spain Wildfires Burn Area Equivalent To Half Million Soccer Fields: Report
content: Deadly wildfires ravaging Spain have burnt the equivalent of nearly half a million football fields this year, setting a new record for the country, a European monitor said Monday.

title: "Disappointing": Rajnath Singh As Opposition Skips Shubhanshu Shukla Discussion
content: "Extremely Disappointing Behaviour": Rajnath Singh After Opposition Skips Shubhanshu Shukla Discussion

title: House Caves In, Several Other Structures Damaged In Dhanbad Land Sinking
content: A house caved in and a dozen others developed cracks after a land subsidence incident in a Bharat Coking Coal Ltd (BCCL) area, about 19 km from Dhanbad district headquarters on Monday, a company official said.

title: "I'm A Powerful Leader": Himanta Sarma On Gaurav Gogoi's 'Secret Phone' Claim
content: Assam Congress chief Gaurav Gogoi alleged that the state's Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma has a 'secret phone' to contact the former's party in times of crisis.

title: All About The Crimean Peninsula Russia Seized From Ukraine Over A Decade Ago
content: Russia's illegal seizure of the Crimean Peninsula from Ukraine in March 2014 was quick and bloodless, and it sent Moscow's relations with the West into a downward spiral unseen since the Cold War.

title: India Bloc Meet Underway To Discuss Opposition's Joint Vice President Candidate
content: The INDIA bloc is holding a meet to finalise the Opposition candidate for the Vice President post -- the election is on September 9.

title: Airtel Services Temporarily Down In Delhi-NCR, Company Apologises
content: Airtel users in Delhi and neighbouring areas are facing an outage, with many complaining of not being able to make calls, send messages and access the internet. Some have also said that they are not getting a signal at all.

title: Hurricane Erin To Bring Dangerous Surf, Rip Currents To US Coast
content: A stronger and bigger Hurricane Erin pelted parts of the Caribbean and was forecast to create dangerous surf and rip currents along the U.S. East Coast this week.

title: Opinion: Opinion | Bomb And The Button: Time To Call Pakistan's Nuclear Blackmail By Its Name
content: For decades, Pakistan's military has wielded its nuclear arsenal not as a deterrent, but as a diplomatic cudgel - a tool to intimidate India, extract concessions, and shield itself from accountability.

title: "Rise Above Party Lines": BJP, AIADMK To Opposition Over Vice President Pick
content: A day after the NDA fielded Tamil Nadu's veteran leader and Maharashtra Governor CP Radhakrishnan as its Vice President candidate, both the AIADMK and the BJP in the state have appealed to all political parties to extend support to his candidature.

title: 23% Of Total 56.04 Crore PM Jan Dhan Accounts Remain Inactive
content: As many as 23 per cent of the total 56.04 crore Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY) accounts are inoperative, Minister of State for Finance Pankaj Chaudhary said on Monday.

title: "Disability Of Cadets During Training Can't Be Deterrent, Provide Insurance Cover": Top Court To Centre
content: The Supreme Court said it wants defence forces to have "braveheart cadets" who should not be deterred by injuries suffered during training and directed the Centre to explore the possibility of providing them with insurance coverage

title: "Russia Should Not Be Rewarded For Its Participation In This War": Zelensky
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said on Monday that Russia should not be "rewarded" for its war, hours before high-stakes talks with US counterpart Donald Trump.

title: Belagavi milk union decides to redistribute profit of ‚Çπ10 crore among farmers
content: We have made a modest profit of ‚Çπ13 crore last year, says MLA and union president Balachandra Jarkiholi

title: Here are the big stories from Karnataka today
content: Welcome to the Karnataka Today newsletter, your guide from The Hindu on the major news stories to follow today. Curated and written by Nalme Nachiyar.

title: Supreme Court appoints Justice Dhulia as Chairperson of search panel for V-Cs of two Kerala varsities
content: Supreme Court stresses the need to end the impasse between the Governor and the State over V-C appointments ‚Äòat the earliest‚Äô

title: Cybercrime in Karnataka drops on paper, evolves in reality
content: As public awareness grew, fraudsters devised more advanced methods, such as courier scams and investment scams. These caused victims to lose large amounts, say the police.

title: As Syro-Malabar Church Synod commences, CMI launches stinging attack on bishops over liturgical dispute
content: The clerical congregation criticises the  bishops for the abrupt suspension of the special tribunal established in the Ernakulam-Angamaly Archdiocese without any show-cause notice or warnings.

title: Five-day science exhibition begins at Agriculture college in Shivamogga
content: ISRO, DRDO, Institute of Plasma Research, VITM, and other institutes are participating in the exhibition that will conclude on August 22

title: Govt. school enrolment in Karnataka has declined by 10.38% in three years
content: Enrolment to government primary schools and high schools across the State has shown a steady decline since the 2022-2023 academic year, according to data placed by the Department of School Education and Literacy before the Legislative Council on Monday. The enrolment has shown a decline by 10.38% in three years

title: West Bengal academics object to certain members of panel selecting V-Cs for 15 State universities
content: The selection panel, chaired by retired CJI U.U. Lalit, includes Ramesh Chandra, former V-C of Maharaja Surajmal Brij University, Bharatpur, Rajasthan, who is facing graft charges; and a retired IAS officer working for the Raj Bhavan

title: Discharge of water from KRS: HDK instructs Mandya DC to fill up lakes in district
content: Kumaraswamy, who also represents Mandya in the Lok Sabha, called up the Deputy Commissioner over phone from New Delhi after seeing media reports on the authorities stepping up the outflow of water from KRS on Monday

title: My plan is to revive AIADMK, says V.K. Sasikala
content: Supporting the sanitation workers, she alleges that the DMK has not fulfilled its promise of regularising their jobs

title: Kerala HC permits woman doctor to implead in sexual assault case against Vedan
content: Complainant has alleged that the rapper had sexually assaulted her multiple times on the promise of marriage. Vedan terms the relationship consensual

title: Art reflects the values of law and justice, says judge
content: Exhibition of paintings and photographs¬†organized by the¬†Zilla Kannada Sahitya Parishat¬†inaugurated in Kalaburagi

title: Two Maoists arrested in Jharkhand's Latehar
content: Jharkhand police arrest two JJMP members in Latehar district after raiding their homes based on a tip-off

title: Cow goes missing after highway accident; sparks concern over lack of animal rescue helpline
content: Minister T.R.B. Raaja responds to a social media posting and alerts Thanjavur district administration; by the time confusion over jurisdiction was cleared and rescue time reached the spot, it was too late

title: Bengaluru police book former UP MLA for sexual assault on woman in city hotel
content: The victim had allegedly been in a live-in relationship with 51-year-old Bhagwan Sharma, a former MLA from the Debai Assembly constituency in UP‚Äôs Bulandshahr district since 2017, and the couple has a seven-year-old son.

title: Karnataka losing over ‚Çπ20,000 crore annually after migration to GST regime
content: Karnataka has been losing ‚Çπ20,000 crore to ‚Çπ25,000 crore annually owing to migration to the Goods and Services Tax regime in 2017, while the State‚Äôs contribution to the GST pool has been increasing

title: SPDCL says there‚Äôs no negligence of utility for electrocution
content: The local officials of the power utility informed the CMD that an unused television cable snapped and had fallen on the 11kV overhead line and then onto the chariot with the metal/iron frame allowing transmission of power and led to electrocution

title: Don‚Äôt panic over heart attacks as numbers show no alarming rise: Karnataka Minister
content: Though concerns have been raised over heart attacks related to lifestyle, there has been no significant increase in numbers, says Sharan Prakash Patil

title: Delhi HC reserves order on jailed MP Engineer Rashid's plea over security expenses
content: The court observed if Mr. Rashid was not released on interim bail and attended Parliament in custody, why should he, and not the jail authorities, bear the costs

title: Chief Minister to inaugurate work on Kalladi-Meppadi  tunnel road project in Kozhikode on August 31
content: ‚Çπ2,134-crore project will be completed in association with Public Works department, Kerala Infrastructure Investment Fund Board and Konkan Railway Corporation

title: CEC did not answer our questions, acting like a BJP spokesperson: Opposition
content: Trinamool Congress (TMC) leader Mahua Moitra said that if the voter list, on which the last general election was conducted, is not correct, the Lok Sabha should be dissolved

title: Parliament passes Bill to consolidate law relating to ports, facilitate ease of doing business
content: The Indian Ports Bill 2025, which was passed by the Lok Sabha on August 12, was introduced in the Upper House on Monday amid noisy protests by the Opposition

title: Kerala government committed to sustainable development of State‚Äôs coastal areas: Minister Rajeeve
content: Inaugurating a two-day workshop on ‚ÄòResilient coasts, thriving communities: A sea of solutions,‚Äô the Minister says projects, including construction of tetrapod seawall, are being carried out to resist sea incursion and other issues caused by climate change

title: Jagan Mohan Reddy expresses shock over electrocution tragedy in Hyderabad
content: Jagan Mohan Reddy wished for the speedy recovery of the injured and urged officials to take stringent safety measures to ensure such accidents do not recur in the future

title: Heavy rain likely to continue in coastal districts on August 19 and 20 as depression is likely to form over the Bay
content: The well-marked low-pressure area over west central and northwest Bay of Bengal, off north Andhra Pradesh-south Odisha coasts, persisted over the same region at 8.30 a.m. on August 18, 2025

title: Illegal tree felling threatens Vaniyanthal lake nesting site in Kallakurichi
content: The tree felling has been continuing over the past few days and nearly 30% of the total 900 trees in and around the lake have been cut, according to environmentalists.

title: Supreme Court asks if NHAI ought to compensate commuters for fuel, patience in 12-hour traffic snarl in Kerala
content: It wasn‚Äôt an ‚Äòact of God‚Äô; the overturned truck that caused the snarl fell into a pothole as ‚Äòthe road is in such a state of disrepair,‚Äô the court remarked, referring to media reports

title: 15 lakh families in Karnataka ineligible for BPL cards, process of weeding them out to begin after monsoon session of legislature
content: He acknowledged that 3.22 lakh families have applied for BPL cards, but they are yet to get the cards

title: Letter row in CPI(M): Kerala Minister M.B. Rajesh alleges attempts to defame him ahead of elections
content: Minister says similar allegations had surfaced against him ahead of the previous Assembly election as well

title: SC judge K. Vinod Chandran recuses from hearing plea over AMU V-C‚Äôs appointment
content: The top court was apprised about Ms. Khatoon becoming the vice-chancellor (V-C) after getting the key vote of her husband who was then the V-C of AMU.

title: National Cooperation Policy 2025 detrimental to Kerala‚Äôs cooperative sector: Kerala Cooperative Employees‚Äô Union
content: KCEU to take out Raj Bhavan march and district-level protests on August 20 in protest against the policy

title: Lok Sabha discusses Shubhanshu Shukla‚Äôs space mission: Indian on moon will herald Viksit Bharat in 2040, says Jitendra Singh
content: After opening up the space sector for private players in 2020, India‚Äôs space economy has already reached $8 billion and would touch $45 billion in the next decade, Union Minister Jitendra Singh said

title: Kerala‚Äôs Food Minister hints at further coconut oil price cuts ahead of Onam
content: G.R. Anil says crucial meeting to be held at Supplyco headquarters in Kochi to deliberate on potential price cuts

title: Flood warning issued to 11 districts in Tamil Nadu
content: The warning was issued to Salem, Erode, Namakkal, Karur, Ariyalur, Tiruchi, Thanjavur, Tiruvarur, Mayiladuthurai, Nagapattinam, and Cuddalore districts.

title: Online applications invited from farmers for crop competition under agriculture awards scheme in Karnataka
content: Interested farmers and women-farmers must submit their applications separately through the Agriculture Department‚Äôs K-Kisan portal

title: NDA's V-P candidate Radhakrishnan meets PM Modi
content: Mr. Radhakrishnan is expected to be felicitated at the meeting of the NDA parliamentary party on August 19, 2025

title: Kerala accuses Centre of withholding ‚Çπ2,601-crore MSP dues owed to paddy farmers
content: Kerala Food and Civil Supplies Minister says Centre has withheld a total of ‚Çπ2,601 crore owed to State paddy farmers, including ‚Çπ1,259 crore pending since the 2017-18 fiscal year, and ‚Çπ1,342 crore for paddy procured in the 2024-25 procurement season

title: Hebbal flyover loop inaugurated in Bengaluru, expected to ease traffic congestion for vehicles heading from K.R. Puram to Mekhri Circle
content: Adding a personal touch to the event, DCM D.K. Shivakumar brought along his newly-restored Yezdi motorcycle for a trial ride on the new K.R. Puram loop.

title: Debate rages in Kerala over stray dog control as rabies takes a toll on lower-income groups
content: In Kerala too, where public concern has been mounting over growing stray dog population and rising rabies deaths, animal rights activists face bitter opposition from families who have lost their children to the disease

title: Many Kolleru Lake bed villages facing flood threat in Eluru district
content: Police arrange pickets as flood water rises at Penumakalanka, Peddayedlagadi, Kovvadalanka, Takkellapadu and other island villages in Kaikalur and Mandavalli mandals

title: Chief Election Commissioner‚Äôs press briefing raises more questions than providing¬†answers to issues highlighted¬†by INDIA bloc: T.N. CM Stalin
content: ‚ÄúIf ‚ÄòFair Elections‚Äô is truly the aim of the ECI, why can‚Äôt it be more transparent and voter-friendly?,‚Äù posed Mr. Stalin who is also the DMK president.¬†

title: DRG Jawan killed, three injured as IED planted by Maoists explodes in Chhattisgarh's Bijapur
content: The explosion occurred in the morning in Indravati National Park area when a team of DRG, a unit of the State police, was out on an anti-Maoist operation, a senior official said

title: Death threat to Kamal Haasan: TV actor moves Madras High Court seeking anticipatory bail
content: Says, the words uttered by him regarding, slitting of throat, during a YouTube interview were ‚Äúunintentional‚Äù

title: Row over letter leak: CPI(M) gears up to counter Congress-BJP ‚Äòslander campaign‚Äô against top leadership in Kerala
content: Saying ‚Äòabsurd questions do not merit answers‚Äô, CPI(M) Kerala secretary M.V. Govindan declines to comment on whether Polit Bureau received a confidential letter detailing alleged financial nexus

title: Karnataka rain: Farmers of ‚Äòtoor bowl‚Äô stare at losses following excess rainfall
content: Vast tracts of pulse fields in Kalaburagi and surrounding districts face destruction after 15 days of incessant rains lashing the region. To add to the problem, farmers who insured their crops under the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana are facing a new hurdle

title: T.N. BJP, Tamil Maanila Congress urge INDIA bloc to support C.P. Radhakrishnan‚Äôs candidature for Vice-President post
content: G.K. Vasan  said Mr. Radhakrishnan being chosen as an NDA candidate for the post of Vice-President was a ‚Äòproud moment for Tamil Nadu and Tamil language‚Äô.¬†

title: ‚ÄòKodi‚Äô Suni, convict in T.P. Chandrasekharan murder case, shifted from Kannur Central Jail to Tavanur¬†prison
content: Shifting follows reports of misconduct, including allegations of drinking on Thalassery court premises. A prison department report earlier stated Suni was using mobile phone inside jail and was involved in illegal activities outside

title: U.P. school mergers: Supreme Court asks AAP MP to move High Court against order to merge low-enrolment schools
content: The Rajya Sabha MP had said the State‚Äôs order had adversely affected the educational access of numerous children

title: Andhra‚Äôs Eluru SP urges public vigilance amid heavy rains, flood threat
content: The SP noted that the Godavari river, streams, canals, and nearby low-lying areas are witnessing heavy water flow, creating a risk of flooding

title: Election Commission of India makes public names of 65 lakh people deleted from Bihar voter list during SIR
content: ECI is publishing the names of ‚ÄòASD‚Äô (Absentee, Shifted, and Dead) voters across polling booths, and is likely to do so online as has been directed by the apex court

title: Madras High Court takes special steps to dispose of petty criminal cases pending in Tamil Nadu, Puducherry
content: The goal is to reduce the clogs in the wheels of administration of criminal justice and ensure availability of quality time for trial of appropriate cases

title: Andhra Minister Nara Lokesh meets Union Minister Jaishankar; seeks support for various initiatives¬†
content: Andhra Pradesh IT Minister Nara Lokesh requested S. Jaishankar to help positioning Andhra Pradesh as a frontrunner in India‚Äôs global workforce vision

title: Supreme Court stays HC order reversing discharge of T.N. Minister I. Periyasamy in DA case
content: The Minister has argued that these cases were products of the political rivalry, referring to a similar disproportionate assets case registered against him and his family concerning tax returns between 1996 and 2001

title: Tamil Nadu MPs should support C.P. Radhakrishnan for Vice-President post: Edappadi Palaniswami
content: All MPs, shedding their political differences, should back Radhakrishnan, urged the AIADMK general secretary

title: Supreme Court says injured trainee cadets cannot be left ‚Äòhigh-and-dry‚Äô, seeks Centre‚Äôs response
content: The Court suggested the government could consider providing injured cadets for alternative training and posts in the Armed Forces after their medical treatment

title: Air India cancels Zurich-Delhi flight citing technical issue
content: In the last two days, Air India has cancelled at least two flights, including one international, at the last moment, citing technical reasons

title: Kerala rains: IMD sounds orange alert for two districts, yellow for seven
content: Presence of strong westerlies over Kerala fuelled by the low-pressure area is expected to cause widespread rains across parts of central and north Kerala for the next few days

title: Supreme Court affirms HC order quashing FIR in Mohan Delkar death case
content: The Bombay High Court, in 2022, had quashed the case against nine persons in the abetment of suicide case of former Lok Sabha MP Mohan Delkar in 2021

title: Low pressure over Bay of Bengal likely to intensify; heavy rains forecast for Andhra Pradesh
content: Under its influence, coastal Andhra Pradesh is expected to receive widespread rains, with heavy to very heavy rainfall at isolated places. Rayalaseema districts may witness light to moderate showers

title: Search for missing enters fifth day in cloudburst-hit J&K‚Äôs Kishtwar village despite heavy rain
content: Rescue teams brave rain and debris to search for missing persons after cloudburst in Chisoti, Jammu and Kashmir

title: 31 children, a teacher hospitalised after van accident in Kerala‚Äôs Thiruvananthapuram
content: Incident raises questions about safety of transporting children to schools, especially in crowded private vans, cars and autorickshaws

title: Putin-Modi talks: Russian president dials PM; shares insights on Alaska meet with Trump
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi received a call from Russian President Vladimir Putin, who shared insights from his recent Alaska meeting with US President Donald Trump regarding a proposed peace deal. PM Modi reaffirmed India's consistent advocacy for a peaceful resolution to the Ukraine conflict and expressed support for all efforts aimed at achieving that goal.

title: 'Differences must not become disputes': Jaishankar meets Chinese counterpart
content: Foreign Minister Wang Yi's visit to New Delhi marks a renewed effort to improve Sino-Indian relations. Wang's meeting with S Jaishankar and participation in border talks with Ajit Doval, follows agreements made between Modi and Xi in Kazan. China aims to build political trust, expand cooperation, and manage differences for stable bilateral ties.

title: YSRCP backs CP Radhakrishnan: Jagan's party supports NDA nominee
content: The YSR Congress Party, with its 11 MPs, has pledged its support to NDA's vice-presidential candidate, C P Radhakrishnan, bolstering the ruling alliance's prospects. YSRCP MP Maddila Gurumoorthy confirmed the party's backing, even as the opposition gears up to nominate its own candidate. Defence Minister Rajnath Singh reportedly contacted YSR Congress chief Jagan Mohan Reddy to secure the endorsement.

title: Exports to US likely saw 7x faster growth vs overall rise
content: Indian exports to the US surged by 21% due to frontloading in anticipation of Trump's tariffs, overshadowing overall export growth. While exporters are offering discounts to retain business amidst uncertainty, concerns remain about sustaining operations if tariffs reach 50%. Industry leaders are seeking government support to mitigate potential job losses, particularly in the MSME sector.

title: Moody's chief economist thinks the US is on the verge of recession has...
content: Amidst rising recession fears, Moody's Analytics chief economist Mark Zandi offers a glimmer of hope for tech professionals. Despite troubling economic indicators like flatlined consumer spending and contracting manufacturing, Zandi highlights the tech sector's resilience. Factors such as persistent AI demand, cloud infrastructure investment, global hiring flexibility, and digital transformation spending are expected to insulate the industry.

title: 'Seriously controversial': Trump questions accuracy of voting machines; vows to end mail-in ballots
content: Donald Trump announced a movement to eliminate mail-in ballots and voting machines before the 2026 midterms, citing "massive voter fraud." He plans an executive order targeting voting machines and advocates for watermarked paper ballots, claiming they're faster and more reliable.

title: 'Don‚Äôt make Vaibhav Suryavanshi wait': Team India's Asia Cup squad selection debate receives fresh twist
content: Kris Srikkanth, former India captain, has surprisingly advocated for 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi's inclusion in the Asia Cup T20 squad. Suryavanshi's impressive IPL 2025 performance and U19 tour of England have made him a strong contender. Srikkanth emphasizes Suryavanshi's maturity and shot-making ability, urging selectors to consider him for the upcoming T20 World Cup.

title: Mass layoffs: CEO laid off 80% employees two years ago; now says that he‚Ä¶.
content: IgniteTech CEO Eric Vaughan replaced nearly 80% of his workforce in 2023 due to resistance to the company's AI adoption mandate. Despite employee sabotage and refusal to participate, the transformation led to substantial returns, including the launch of two AI solutions and high profit margins. Vaughan doesn't recommend this strategy, citing cultural resistance as the cause.

title: 'EC must first affirm voter list is clean, then we'll comply': INDIA bloc steps up attack
content: The INDIA bloc has criticised the Election Commission. Opposition leaders allege misconduct in recent elections. They question the special revision of electoral rolls in Bihar. Concerns were raised about voter list irregularities in Maharashtra and Karnataka. Trinamool Congress leader Mahua Moitra called for dissolving the Lok Sabha. The opposition demands accountability from the Election Commission.

title: Sophie Cunningham injury update: How the Indiana fever guard got injured
content: Sophie Cunningham sustained a right knee injury during a game against Connecticut Sun. The incident occurred in the second quarter. Cunningham's injury adds to the Fever's existing injury woes. An MRI is scheduled to determine the extent of the damage. Fans and teammates express their support. The team is awaiting the MRI results.

title: Microsoft's new return to office plan: Company requires 3-day office attendance
content: Microsoft will require employees near its Redmond headquarters to work in the office at least three days a week starting in January 2025, potentially leading to resignations. This shift reverses previous flexibility and aligns Microsoft with other tech giants mandating in-office attendance. Employees view the policy as a possible "stealth layoff" amid concerns about office space and resources, despite the company's strong financial performance.

title: MP shocker: Class 2 student found dead under mysterious circumstances in hostel; probe under way
content: A Class 2 student, Anurag (7), was discovered dead in the Gyan Ganga School hostel in Khajuraho, Madhya Pradesh. His roommate found him unresponsive, and authorities were alerted. While no external injuries were visible, blue marks were noted on his body, prompting police to investigate potential poisoning or insect bites.

title: B-schools see non-engineers rise: Engineering dominance cracks; What‚Äôs behind the management reset?
content: India‚Äôs elite B-schools are witnessing a paradigm shift: engineers no longer dominate MBA classrooms. Non-engineers‚Äîeconomists, commerce graduates, and humanities students‚Äîare now matching or surpassing their peers in institutes like IIM Ahmedabad, Lucknow, and Indore. Changing corporate demands, revamped admission policies, and rising aspirations among non-engineers are driving this transformation, signaling the end of engineering monopoly in management education.

title: Bumrah offered fresh advice on workload: 'Our physios are the better judges'
content: Former BCCI chairman Chetan Sharma has defended Jasprit Bumrah's decision to play only three Tests against England, citing workload management based on medical advice. Sharma expressed confidence in India's chances at the upcoming Asia Cup, emphasising the team's strong performance and the advantage of hosting the T20 World Cup in 2026.

title: How Gavin Newsom is out-trumping Trump
content: That viral split screen of scarf vs fatigues was meant to define who had grit and who had privilege. But in modern politics, biography matters less than performance. Vance leveraged his Marine past to ride Trump‚Äôs coattails into the vice presidency. Newsom is leveraging parody to carve out space as the Democrat unafraid of MAGA. Act one was the split screen. Act two is the troll war. Act three, if it comes, will be 2028 ‚Äî where Gavin Newsom will either be remembered as the liberal who cosplayed Trump for a season or the Democrat who figured out how to use memes to win power. Could he be the Lyndon Johnson of the meme era ‚Äî underestimated, even mocked, until history forced him into greatness? That remains unanswered. But for now, MAGA finally knows what it feels like to be on the receiving end of ridicule. And Gavin Newsom is laughing loudest.

title: Arjun Tendulkar engaged to Saaniya Chandok: How has Sachin's son performed on the field?
content: Arjun Tendulkar, son of cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar, recently got engaged to Saaniya Chandok, who hails from a prominent Mumbai business family. The private, family-oriented ceremony marks a joyous occasion for both families.

title: Airtel down: Thousands of users unable to make calls, access internet data
content: Airtel is currently grappling with a significant service outage, impacting thousands of subscribers who are reporting disruptions in both voice and data services since approximately 3:30 PM. Users are expressing their frustration on X, highlighting issues with making calls, sending messages, and accessing mobile internet.

title: Mumbai rains: Heavy showers flood roads tracks, bring city to standstill - video
content: Mumbai was hit by torrential rainfall, leading to severe waterlogging and traffic disruptions across the city. Several areas recorded over 100 mm of rain in just six hours, paralyzing transportation and prompting school closures.

title: 'India like shining Mercedes': Pak interior min echoes Munir's crude analogy
content: Pakistan's Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi has escalated tensions with India by repeating a controversial analogy made by Army Chief Asim Munir, comparing India to a ‚Äúshining Mercedes‚Äù and Pakistan to a ‚Äúdump truck.‚Äù This statement, initially made during a Saudi delegation visit aimed at de-escalating border tensions, has drawn criticism.

title: 'You‚Äôre Tharoor in saree': Priyanka shares humorous moment - see how Shashi responded
content: Priyanka Chaturvedi's podcast banter with Smika Prakash, referencing Shashi Tharoor, sparked a witty exchange online. Chaturvedi, part of a delegation highlighting India's anti-terrorism stance post-Operation Sindoor, emphasized representing the nation abroad despite being a vocal opposition member domestically. She also criticized the Election Commission of India, expressing concerns about eroding public trust and perceived bias towards the BJP.

title: Exclusive | 'Don't underestimate Shubman Gill' - Harbhajan Singh
content: With the Asia Cup 2025 squad set to be announced, Harbhajan Singh has backed Shubman Gill for inclusion despite stiff competition from India‚Äôs power-hitters. Bhajji insisted Gill‚Äôs solid basics and adaptability make him a potential T20 dominator. Calling this a ‚Äúnew era‚Äù without Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma, Harbhajan praised the youngsters for carrying forward Indian cricket‚Äôs legacy.

title: 9-year-old girl dies due to 'brain-eating amoeba' in Kerala
content: A nine-year-old girl from Thamarassery, Kerala, succumbed to a brain infection. The infection was due to Naegleria fowleri. Health officials confirmed the death. This is the fourth reported case in the district this year. Authorities are investigating the source of the infection. Experts advise caution when swimming in freshwater. They also recommend using sterile water for nasal cleaning.

title: Watch: Bhuni toll plaza vandalised following assault on army jawan
content: An Army jawan, Kapil Kavad, was assaulted at Bhuni Toll Plaza in Meerut, triggering a violent reaction from villagers. They stormed the toll, vandalizing property and confronting staff. Police have arrested four individuals and deployed a heavy force to the area, while CCTV footage is being reviewed as part of the ongoing investigation.

title: ‚ÄòAnother war may happen‚Äô: Khamenei‚Äôs aide warns US, Israel
content: A top advisor to Iran's Supreme Leader warned that renewed conflict with the U.S. or Israel could erupt anytime, escalating regional tensions. Yahya Rahim Safavi emphasized Iran's need to bolster its defenses across all sectors. This warning follows reported Israeli strikes on Iranian command centers and U.S.

title: Harjinder Singh faces deportation: Trucker took reckless U-turn in Florida that killed 3
content: A tragic accident on the Florida Turnpike resulted in three fatalities after a minivan collided with a tractor-trailer executing an illegal U-turn. Harjinder Singh, the truck driver and an undocumented immigrant, faces vehicular homicide charges for allegedly causing the devastating crash near Fort Pierce. The collision occurred when Singh's trailer blocked all lanes, leaving the minivan with no chance to avoid impact.

title: Mumbai rain mayhem: 9 flights abort landing; city waterlogged, trains affected
content: Mumbai experienced significant disruptions due to heavy rainfall, impacting air and road travel. Several flights faced landing difficulties, with some forced to go around or divert. Commuters faced waterlogged roads and slow-moving traffic, prompting travel advisories from airlines.

title: Trump-Zelenskyy meet: Will Ukrainian prez finally suit up after WH wardrobe drama?
content: Volodymyr Zelenskyy is expected to adopt a more formal appearance during his upcoming meeting with US President Donald Trump in Washington, according to a designer who has previously collaborated with him. This shift comes after criticism of his informal attire during a previous visit to the White House.

title: Watch: Children stuck in school bus on flooded Mumbai road; rescued
content: In Mumbai, a school bus with six children and two staff members became stranded in a waterlogged street due to heavy rains. Promptly responding to the emergency, police officers arrived at the scene and successfully rescued all the passengers. Following the rescue, the children were safely transported to the Matunga Police Station.

title: Ranthambore guide abandons vehicle mid-jungle in dark; 3 vehicles, drivers banned
content: Following a concerning incident where tourists were left stranded in Ranthambore forest due to a vehicle breakdown and subsequent failures in assistance, authorities have banned three safari vehicles, their drivers, and a guide.

title: 'War 2' box office live: Hrithik Roshan, Jr NTR starrer starts slow
content: Released on August 14th amidst a clash with 'Coolie', 'War 2' initially lagged behind, earning ‚Çπ51.5 crore on its first day. However, boosted by Independence Day, day 2 collections surged to ‚Çπ56.50 crore, crossing ‚Çπ100 crore in all languages. While the Hindi version rebounded strongly, the Telugu version saw a significant drop over the weekend, with total collections reaching ‚Çπ175.

title: Netaji 'fled fearing British'? Kerala's SCERT corrects textbook error
content: Kerala's SCERT corrected a historic error in a Class 4 teachers' handbook that wrongly stated Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose 'fled fearing the British' before forming the INA. The mistake was flagged by teachers and quickly removed, prompting an internal inquiry. The controversy sparked criticism from the ABVP, accusing the Kerala government of distorting history and undermining national unity. Complaints have been filed demanding strict action and better oversight of educational materials.

title: Delhi horror: Man rapes mother twice
content: In a shocking incident in Delhi's Hauz Qazi, a 39-year-old man has been arrested following allegations of raping his 66-year-old mother. The victim, along with her daughter, reported the crime to the police, stating the assaults occurred after their return from a pilgrimage.

title: Princess Anne's 75th Birthday: William and Kate share a simple message with a new portrait
content: Princess Anne celebrated her 75th birthday, marked by a newly released portrait and a simple birthday wish from the Prince and Princess of Wales. The imagery and messages emphasized her dedication to service and her understated style.

title: ‚ÄòRacist‚Äô: Swatch ad outrages China; watchmaker apologises over ‚Äòslant-eye‚Äô gesture
content: Swatch, a Swiss watchmaker, faced criticism in China. An advertisement was deemed racist. It showed an Asian model pulling his eyes. This gesture offended many Chinese social media users. They called for a boycott. Swatch apologised and removed the ad globally. However, many felt the apology was insufficient.

title: Asia Cup 2025: SKY to stay as India‚Äôs T20I captain, Gill likely to miss out
content: India are set to back Suryakumar Yadav as T20I captain for Asia Cup 2025, with Shubman Gill and Shreyas Iyer likely to miss out despite stellar form. Samson, Abhishek Sharma, and Tilak Varma remain first-choice batters, while Jasprit Bumrah returns to lead the attack. Mohammed Siraj is expected to be rested, with Prasidh Krishna and Washington Sundar among likely inclusions.

title: Woman‚Äôs father runs over couple on bike; man killed, daughter injured
content: In Madurai, a man was killed after being run over by his girlfriend's father, who disapproved of their relationship. The couple, who had previously eloped, were targeted after leaving a police station following a dispute over alleged stolen jewelry. The woman is hospitalized, and her father has been arrested for planning the murder.

title: Tariff war: It‚Äôs time to buy India, not sell, says Jefferies‚Äô Wood
content: Jefferies' Christopher Wood advises investors to buy Indian equities, anticipating Trump will back down from tariff threats, which are not in America's interest. Wood highlights India's recent underperformance and high valuations but notes its tendency to rebound after such periods.

title: Putin‚Äôs bodyguards allegedly carried ‚Äòpoop suitcase‚Äô for his meeting with Trump
content: Reports indicate that Vladimir Putin's bodyguards collect his fecal waste in a special "poop suitcase" during foreign trips, including his recent meeting with Donald Trump in Alaska. This practice, reportedly dating back to 1999, aims to prevent foreign powers from analyzing his health.

title: Man stabs ex-girlfriend‚Äôs new lover; says he was ‚Äòunwilling to accept breakup‚Äô
content: In Bengaluru, a 26-year-old salesman named Yatish, fueled by anger over his girlfriend's breakup and new relationship, orchestrated a stabbing attack on his rival, Chandan Gowda, near Jataka Stand. Yatish, along with his brother Harsha, has been arrested for attempted murder after Chandan was rushed to the hospital with stab wounds to his chest and abdomen.

title: How did police recover 295 medals of Bula Choudhury? Padma Shri brooch still missing
content: Former swimming legend Bula Choudhury's stolen medals have been recovered by Chandannagar Commissionerate and CID, forty-eight hours after she reported the theft at her Hindmotor house. A total of 295 medals, along with idols and medals stolen in 2014, were found.

title: ‚ÄòStop buying Russian crude oil‚Äô: Trump adviser tells India
content: A Trump administration advisor has urged India to cease purchasing Russian crude oil, asserting that India is strengthening ties with Russia and China. Peter Navarro suggests India's actions undermine its strategic partnership with the US.

title: Voter 'chori' claim: INDIA bloc to bring impeachment notice against CEC?
content: Following Rahul Gandhi's allegations of vote irregularities in Karnataka, the Congress party is considering strong actions against Chief Election Commissioner Gyanesh Kumar, who demanded an apology or affidavit from Gandhi. Opposition parties are contemplating an impeachment motion against Kumar during the Monsoon Session, accusing him of bias towards the BJP.

title: NFL preseason Week 2 takeaways: Caleb Williams looks sharp in preseason debut
content: the second week of the 2025 preseason kicked off on friday . the Bears didn't let a bungled kickoff return that buried them at the 8-yard line on their first drive or a holding penalty derail momentum .

title: ‚õ≥ Augusta National ditches masses for revenue
content: the 2026 "Official Masters Hospitality" program includes offers of housing, transportation, catering and so on to the corporate and/or well-heeled . the "Full Scale, Private Home Program," which will run you a mere $219,600 for the week, comes days after the announcement that a local Hooters restaurant is closing .

title: NFL preseason trade tracker: Every move leading up to the 2025 season
content: the NFL preseason has arrived, with all 32 teams navigating their training camps and prepping for the 2025 season . as teams continue to tinker with their final rosters, we are tracking every trade before the season kicks off on sept. 4 . the latest moves came Sunday, with the Eagles sending tight end Harrison Bryant to Houston for wide receiver John Metchie III .

title: The best tifos from the Premier League's opening weekend
content: arsenal beat manchester united 1-0 at the emirates on sunday . tifos and banners on display in the stands . the 2025-26 campaign began with a m-shirt . click here for more premier league news .

title: Draft Guide: Rankings, mock drafts and analysis
content: this draft guide will serve as one-stop shop for all of our best fantasy football picks possible in every draft you're in . we have everything needed to help you draft a great team and start the season with a shot . it doesn't matter whether you have been doing this for years or are a first-timer .

title: UFC 319 Fight Grades: Did two spinning back elbow finishes save the card?
content: a middleweight title fight between the unstoppable force and the immovable object ( Dricus Du Plessis) headlined the UFC's return to Chicago on Saturday . the main card was left to do the heavy lifting in the highlight department . two fighters -- Prates and Lerone Murphy -- will find themselves in the conversation for 2025 knockout of the year .

title: What Bengals' Trey Hendrickson, Commanders' Terry McLaurin are missing as season nears
content: two teams with super bowl aspirations share a less savory commonality . each has a top player who has been holding-in while trying to secure a contract extension . the two teams will remain sidelined tonight's preseason game at Northwest Stadium .

title: Preseason Power Rankings: How all 32 teams stack up, plus who's under pressure
content: the 2025 season is just around the corner, so it's time to reevaluate the outlooks for all 32 teams . our power panel of more than 30 writers and editors evaluate how teams stack up against each other, ranking them from 1 to 32 . this is the last offseason edition of power rankings .

title: How 'A League of Their Own' started a feud between Madonna and Evansville, Indiana
content: EVANSVILLE, INDIANA, is one of America's biggest small towns . residents are proud of their town's resilience during the 1937 flood . they're proud of the city's role in world war II as a major manufacturing hub .
